alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Trumbull, Geauga, northeastern Cuyahoga, southern Lake and southwestern Ashtabula Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Euclid, or over Willowick, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, Timberlake, Lakeline, Chesterland, South Euclid, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland and Lyndhurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull
